name: Milites Fortunae
description:
Welcome to Milites Fortunae, a strategy game where you control a team of warriors! Take turns with your opponent as your warriors perform attacks known as Abilities, to deplete enemy units health and claim victory!

As a gamer with a job and family I understand that your time is valuable. This is a game that doesn't waste your time. You won't spend hours fiddling about with menus, or waiting for cutscenes to play. Instead it focuses on getting you into battle with a combat system that is easy to learn but difficult to master. Battles are tense and often one mistake is the difference between success and failure!

Key Features include:
-Deep, Strategic Turn-Based Combat
-Multiple Classes of Warriors
-Numerous Abilities
-Upgradeable Stats
-Approximately 5 hours of gameplay
